tool_description: Developer-first service to forecast time series data thanks to a managed AI and an easy to use rest API.
name: meqem
title: meqem

api_list.name: Get/Download forecast
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the forecast data in JSON format (array of json). Before calling this endpoint you need to make sure that the forecast has done by checking if the status parameter is set to done via a GET request.

api_list.name: List all forecasts
api_list.description: This endpoint lists all forecasts that you have created before.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://meqem-meqem-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v0/forecast"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "meqem-meqem-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://meqem-meqem-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v0/forecast"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "meqem-meqem-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get a specific forecast (info only)
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves a specific forecast info. This can be useful if you need to check the status, so when it's done you can access the forecast json via download.
